headerDisplay: A Homebridge plugin for interfacing with a BUSCH-JAEGER free@home setup.
footerDisplay: Control you free@home system with Apple Home using the System Access Point local API.

host.title: System Access Point Hostname
host.description: The system access point host name

user.title: User ID
user.description: The user name that shall be used to authenticate with the system access point.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password that shall be used to authenticate with the system access point

tlsEnabled.title: TLS Enabled
tlsEnabled.description: Determines whether the communication with the system access point shall be protected by TLS. Disabling TLS poses a security risk!

verboseErrors.title: Verbose Errors
verboseErrors.description: Determines whether verbose error messages shall be used, for example for message validation. This is a debug option that should only be enabled if needed.
